p.k: Phantom of the Park Lola has to play a violin solo during the big show tonight. When she is on stage Victor creates an accident as a pretext to make Lola believe the place is haunted. A series of mysterious mishaps occur one after the other and to cap it all Lola’s violin ...
p.d: Despite his small size and playful attitude, Pat is the hero that flies to his friends' rescue while avoiding numerous obstacles that get in his way.
